Verses: 1 nee Un Vaalibappiraayaththile Un Sirushtigarai Ninai; Theengunaatkal Varaadhadharkumunnum, Enakkup Piriyamaanavaigalalla Endru Nee Sollum Varushangal Seraadhadharkumunnum,

3 mazhaikkuppin Megangal Thirumbaththirumba Varaadhadharkumunnum, Veettukkaavalaaligal Thallaadi Belasaaligal Koonippoi, Endhiram Araikkiravargal Konjamaanadhinaal Oindhu, Palaganivazhiyaaip Paarkkiravargal Irundupogiradharkumunnum,
4 endhira Saththam Thaazhndhadhinaal Theruvaasalin Kadhavugal Adaipattu, Kuruviyin Saththaththukkum Ezhundhirukkavendiyadhaagi, Keedhavaaththiyak Kannigaigalellaam Adangippogaadhadharkumunnum,

5 mettukkaaga Achchamundaagi, Vazhiyile Bayangal Thondri, Vaadhumaimaram Pooppooththu, Vettukkiliyum Baaramaagi, Pasiththeepanamum Atruppogaadhadharkumunnum, Manushan Than Niththiya Veettukkup Pogiradhinaale, Dhukkankondaadugiravargal Veedhiyile Thiriyaadhadharkumunnum,
6 vellikkayiru Kattuvittu, Porkinni Nasungi, Ootrin Aruge Saal Udaindhu, Thuravandaiyil Urulai Norungi,
7 ivvidhamaai Mannaanadhu Thaan Munnirundha Boomikkuth Thirumbi, Aavi Thannaith Thandha Dhevanidaththirku Marupadiyum Pogaadhadharkumunnum, Avarai Un Vaalibappiraayaththile Ninai.
8 maayai, Maayai, Ellaam Maayai Endru Prasangi Sollugiraan.
9 melum, Prasangi Gnaanavaanaayirundhapadiyaal, Avan Janaththukku Arivaippodhiththu, Gavanamaaik Kettaaraaindhu Anegam Needhimozhigalai Serththu Ezhudhinaan.
10 idhamaana Vaarththaigalaik Kandupidikka Prasangi Vagaithedinaan; Ezhudhina Vaakkiyangal Sevvaiyum Saththiyamumaanavaigal.
11 gnaanigalin Vaakkiyangal Thaatrukkolgalpolavum Sangaththalaivargalaal Araiyappatta Aanigalpolavum Irukkiradhu; Avaigal Ore Meyppanaal Alikkappattadhu.
12 en Magane! Ivaigalinaale Buththiyadaivaayaaga; Anegam Pusthagangalai Undupannugiradharku Mudivillai; Adhigapadippu Udalukku Ilaippu.
13 kaariyaththin Kadaiththogaiyai Ketpomaaga, Dhevanukku Bayandhu, Avar Karpanaigalaik Kaikkol; Ellaa Manusharmelum Vizhundha Kadamai Idhuve.
14 ovvoru Kiriyaiyaiyum, Andharangamaana Ovvoru Kaariyaththaiyum Nanmaiyaanaalum Theemaiyaanaalum, Dhevan Nyaayaththile Konduvaruvaar.
